commit.message:
GtkListPeer.java (handleEvent): Fix generation of ActionEvents.

2003-12-02  Fernando Nasser  <fnasser@redhat.com>

        * gnu/java/awt/peer/gtk/GtkListPeer.java (handleEvent): Fix generation
        of ActionEvents.
